items.title: Events
items.subtitle:
The Next Century Convocation April 10, 2011
Other MIT150 events start January 7

items.title: Symposia
items.subtitle: During the spring of 2011, a series of symposia designed and developed by MIT faculty will explore issues and topics of interest to MIT as community of scholars, students, and staff

items.title: Open House
items.subtitle: MIT has a long — albeit not contiguous — tradition of opening its doors to the public

items.title: Alumni
items.subtitle: Alumni: discover the many ways to participate in MIT150 celebrations, including submitting your MIT story to the Corridor.

items.title: FAST Arts Festival
items.subtitle: FAST will present an exciting, surprising variety of work, embracing past to future, performance to debate, and installations to the unclassifiable.

items.title: MIT Global Challenge
items.subtitle: The MIT Global Challenge invites the worldwide MIT community and their collaborators to participate in student-led innovation as public service

items.title: MIT Museum
items.subtitle: We’ve collected hundreds of ideas, stories and comments for the MIT 150 Exhibition, which opens at the MIT Museum in 2011. We want yours as well!
